{{Description|Re-enact the story of the Eight Adepts with rattan figures and celebrate Lantern Rite!}}
'''Rattan Immortals''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 5.3]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
January 26, 2025 – February 9, 2025 23:59 (UTC+8)

===Eligibility===
Travelers who have reached [[Adventure Rank]] 10 or above can participate in this event.

===Event Description===
During the event, log into [[Genshin Impact]] daily, claim [[Daily Commission]] Rewards, and complete other missions to obtain Knots.<br>
Each stage of Immortal Tale requires spending Knots to take part. After completing the 3 stages for all Immortal Tales, you can obtain Primogems, Sanctifying Unction, and other in-game rewards as well as decorations for your rattan figure in this event.<br>
After completing each stage, you can obtain Story Inspiration. Accumulate a certain amount of Story Inspiration to obtain Primogems, Hero's Wit, and other rewards.

===Event Rewards===
Complete all Immortal Tales to obtain a total of {{Item|Primogem|x=40}}, {{Item|Sanctifying Unction|x=3}}, {{Item|Hero's Wit|x=3}}, {{Item|Mystic Enhancement Ore|x=8}}, and {{Item|Mora|x=10,000}}.<br>
Accumulate a certain amount of Story Inspiration to obtain a total of {{Item|Primogem|x=80}} and {{Item|Hero's Wit|x=3}}.<br>
Share your Fortune Slip daily to obtain a total of {{Item|Mora|x=15,000}}.<br>
Share the stage your created for the first time to obtain {{Item|Mora|x=5,000}}.

==Endless Mode==
# After completing all Immortal Tales, Endless Mode will be unlocked.
# In Endless Mode, the more stages you clear, the more Story Inspiration you will obtain. With each stage cleared +40 Story Inspiration.
# You can obtain a maximum of 600 Story Inspiration from each round of Endless Mode. Equivalent to 3000 Total Score.
# The more party members you have, the more times you can revive in Endless Mode, up to a maximum of 3 times.

==Friendly Aid==
# You can invite your friends to form a party. You can only be in one party at a time.
# For Travelers who have joined a party, each time they spend Knots to clear a stage, they obtain Story Inspiration not only for themselves but for the entire party.
#* Clear an Immortal Tale for the first time: Grant your party members Story Inspiration +30
#* Clear an Immortal Tale again: Grant your party members Story Inspiration +10
#* Play in Endless Mode: In each round, grant your party members up to Story Inspiration +60
# When returning Travelers clear a stage, they will grant their party members more Story Inspiration:
#* Clear an Immortal Tale for the first time as a returning Traveler: Grant your party members Story Inspiration +50
#* Clear an Immortal Tale again as a returning Traveler: Grant your party members Story Inspiration +15
#* Play in Endless Mode: In each round, grant your party members a higher percentage of obtained Story Inspiration, up to Story Inspiration +60
# After each round is completed, the Story Inspiration gathered will be calculated. If a party member leaves the party, their contributed Story Inspiration will not be deducted.
# When a party lineup is changed, the Story Inspiration contributed to old party members will not be deducted, and the contributions to new party members will start from zero.
# If you have fewer than 3 party members in your party for the day, a random companion will join the next day and contribute a set amount of Story Inspiration. For every party member missing on the current day, the companion joining on the next day will contribute Inspiration +80.
